snippet.title: What Remains Visual Novel — Official English Teaser
snippet.description:
What Remains is an eerie visual novel with a truly branching narrative inspired by Ukrainian folklore.

Goat, Granny, and Bear will lead you through the village in nowhere. You join them in caroling to visit every house, each time making a choice—big or tiny, it will affect the village's future.

Be our guest. Decide peoples' fate, listen to whispers, burn everything to ashes, or give up to your own insanity.

Add What Remains to wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010620
